intro.description: This tutorial guides you through the creation of your first comment.

item.title: Open Views
item.description: Select Window > Show View > Comment Details & Comments Summary in the menubar. This step changes the perspective to set up the Comments Summary-View at bottom and Comment Details on the right side.

item.title: Select File
item.description: Before you can start commenting something, you have to open a file.

item.title: Add Comment
item.description: Now it is possible to insert your first comment.

subitem.label: The first possibility is to insert a comment for the file. This is done pushing the "Add Comment" button in the "Comments Summary".
The second possibility is to mark a piece of code and them press the "Add comment" button in the "Common Summary".

item.title: Insert Content
item.description: After creating the first comment, you have to fill this comment with content. This is possible with the Comment Detail view. Please insert your information (author, status, priority, recipient, text).

item.title: Save Content
item.description: After inserting your content to this comment you have to save it. This is possible in zwo different ways.

subitem.label: The first possibility is to press the "Save" button in the "Comment Detail" view.
The second possibility ist to switch the view. When the "Comment Detail" view loses the focus, there is an automatical save.
